alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range Foothills; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 2:31AM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Shirley Basin, Central Carbon County, Upper North Platte River Basin, Laramie Valley and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Widespread strong crosswinds could create hazardous travel for all motorists on Interstate 80 and north to south oriented highways such as Highway 287...especially for light weight and high profile vehicles...including light load semis and those towing camper trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range Foothills; Upper North Platte River Basin
